Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether omission constitutes misrepresentation under subsection 40(1) requiring mens rea or materiality
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of Program Manager's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Not applicable – issue focused on disclosure, not credibility
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Omission of part-time employment deemed misrepresentation
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Materiality of omitted information regardless of intent
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Requirement for full disclosure in immigration applications
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Program Manager, Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC)
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to disclose all employment as required by application instructions
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Objective assessment of materiality under IRPA
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No requirement for mens rea under subsection 40(1)
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose part-time employment at Adapana
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Applicant’s subjective belief that omission was immaterial
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Process followed as per IRPA guidelines
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that omission was unintentional and immaterial

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose material facts under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the omission constitutes a material fact under subsection 40(1) and if mens rea is required
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review of Program Manager's decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Not applicable – focus on completeness of disclosure
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Withholding material fact affecting immigration eligibility
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Materiality of the fact to the immigration process
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Mandatory full disclosure of all employment
Crimes.Legal_Standard: No mens rea required; strict liability for material omissions
Crimes.Application_Factor: Completeness and accuracy of application data
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Inadmissibility due to failure to disclose material fact
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Definition of 'material fact' and intent requirement
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Failure to disclose part-time employment at Adapana
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Applicant’s belief about immateriality of job
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Adherence to procedural requirements under IRPA
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that omission was not material and lacked intent
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Failure to disclose material fact under IRPA
